title: Variability in air quality, ozone formation potential by VOCs, and associated air pollution attributable health risks for Delhi's inhabitants
content:
Environ. Sci.: Atmos., 2024, 4,897-910
DOI: 10.1039/D4EA00064A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Saurabh Sharma, Anjum Singhal, Veluswamy Venkatramanan, Pawan Verma, Mayank Pandey
The present long-term study has been conducted with dual objectives: firstly, to monitor the spatio-temporal variation of ambient air quality parameters and secondly, to evaluate the impact of air pollutants on the Delhi population.
